originalText.text: The valves in our kitchen sink piping were completely corroded, we had no choice but to replace! In terms of price, professionalism and communication I was impressed with Lopez Plumbing, stellar service and a great guy I appreciate punctuality & I appreciate professionalism and the plumbers from Lopez were class A. Excellent experience

text.text: The valves in our kitchen sink piping were completely corroded, we had no choice but to replace! In terms of price, professionalism and communication I was impressed with Lopez Plumbing, stellar service and a great guy I appreciate punctuality & I appreciate professionalism and the plumbers from Lopez were class A. Excellent experience

originalText.text:
Lopez Plumbing wasn't the cheapest option, but they were the most organized.

The very friendly office staff replied quickly, submitted written estimate and certificate of insurance.

The plumber, Junior, was on time, polite, did good work and used high quality parts.

Despite the higher cost, I would use them again.

originalText.text: Juan tested and found that the gas valve to our gas boiler was not responding. That part alone costs $500, instead Juan resettled & disconnected & reconnected it. He then tested it again and the valve started functioning. We hadn’t turned the boiler on after getting work the last plumber was horrible, he bled the system and the heating began to work! Amazing work working with Lopez Plumbing! They really are a fantastic company, honest & fair!

originalText.text: Had a water valve that broke underground in our building. We called three plumbers showed couldn’t identify the problem. Lopez plumbing came and took care of the issue! The best plumbers in New York!

text.text: Had a water valve that broke underground in our building. We called three plumbers showed couldn’t identify the problem. Lopez plumbing came and took care of the issue! The best plumbers in New York!

originalText.text:
Lopez Plumbing is by far THE best plumbing company in NYC. I own a small business and have been through many plumbing companies in my 42 years in business. Thankfully I came across this company to take care of all my plumbing needs. They are courteous and responsive. Especially in an emergency!
They know exactly what to do to fix any and all plumbing problems. I highly recommend.
